name: Squirrel Launcher
description:
Hey YOU! Yeah, you there! Come here! Your presence has been requested for this here space program! You are to follow me to the nest! There you will be assigned to R.R. (Researcher Robin) and put in charge of advancing our state-of-the-art squirrel flight technology. Why do you ask? Because! Squirrel Intelligence said so! We are to get to the moon! I’m sure this cannon is enough. Your safety is my number one priority! Now sign this here waiver.

And so, it begins. Will you guide the squirrels to the moon? Or will the squirrel space program be doomed to fail?

Launch Squirrels

You will be tasked with launching squirrels into the atmosphere and upgrading their equipment to get further.

Get to the Moon!

Go where no squirrel has gone before! The moon is quite far away and squirrels might not understand just how much of a task this is, but with your help, they just might make it.
